Texts.Eng: 115% Base Power with Pistols and Daggers.
120% Base Power with Bows and Sniper Rifles.

Crouching for 2 seconds grants a 5 second period of Invisibility.
Use Energy to dispel this and gain +33% Bleed Chance for 0.5 seconds.

Press [Shift] + [G] to switch between Fire, Electric, and Nova.
Press [G] to lob a Smokebomb towards your cursor (50 Energy, 6 Second Cooldown). Double-tap [A] or [D] to Dodge (No Energy, 3 Second Cooldown).
Use Alt Fire when Energy is full to Energize Mida (Nova -> Deadfall, Electric -> Pulsar, Fire -> Sunshot): this effect drains Energy and then dissipates.
Grenade, Dodge, and Energize effects depend on Multitool Element.
